comprehensive_overview: r-nor1mix is an R package that provides tools for fitting a normal mixture distribution to data using the expectation-maximization (EM) algorithm. It allows users to estimate the parameters of a mixture of normal distributions from univariate data.
core_features:
1. Fitting normal mixture distributions to data
2. Estimating parameters using the EM algorithm
3. Support for univariate data
4. Visualization of mixture components and density functions
5. Statistical inference and analysis
